itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, June 17, 2013
title: F, E, D, spells what for stimulus policy?
contentencoded:
As uncertainty over the Federal Reserve's stimulus policy continues, financial markets remain on their bumpy ride. Some market observers expect the Fed to quell concerns over its stimulus policy this week. 

Julia Coronado, senior U.S. economist at BNP Paribas, joins Marketplace Morning Report David Brancaccio to discuss.
description: As uncertainty over the Federal Reserve's stimulus policy continues, financial markets prolong their bumpy ride.
teaser: As uncertainty over the Federal Reserve's stimulus policy continues, financial markets prolong their bumpy ride.
